name: yeasty
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
similar to or containing yeast (= a type of fungus that is used in making alcoholic drinks such as beer and wine, and for making bread rise): The air outside had a sweet, yeasty smell. It smells like a good yeasty bread dough. See
yeast
More examplesFewer examplesAn overly yeasty taste is a common fault of home breadmaking.Yeasty aromas were coming off the vat where the bagels were boiling.You could taste the yeasty notes of the sake in the pasta.
